root.name: loadStream()
root.description: Loads a file as a Java InputStream. Reads through a file sequentially as it is downloading or if the file is too large to read at once. The file must be located in the "data" directory or specified by a URL. The file can also be gzip compressed and if its name has a .gz extension it will automatically be decompressed while reading.

parameter.label: filename
parameter.description: String: name of the file or url to load
